verses.text: \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w take|strong="H3423"\w* great \w care|strong="H8104"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w observe|strong="H8104"\w*: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w going|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w through|strong="H3605"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w brought|strong="H2142"\w* thee \w for|strong="H4616"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w through|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* thee \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w prove|strong="H3045"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w might|strong="H4616"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w*, \w whether|strong="H0518"\w* thou wouldst \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w with|strong="H3068"\w* want, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* gave thee \w manna|strong="H4478"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w food|strong="H3899"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* thou \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w*: \w to|strong="H5921"\w* shew \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w alone|strong="H0905"\w* doth \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H6310"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* proceedeth \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

Thy raiment, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H2088"\w* thou wast covered, hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* decayed \w for|strong="H5921"\w* age, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w worn|strong="H1086"\w*, lo \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fortieth|strong="H0705"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*,

\w That|strong="H0834"\w* thou mayst \w consider|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* traineth \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w so|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w trained|strong="H3256"\w* thee \w up|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w That|strong="H3068"\w* thou shouldst \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w walk|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* thee \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w of|strong="H0776"\w* brooks \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w fountains|strong="H5869"\w*: \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* plains \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H4325"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hills|strong="H2022"\w* \w deep|strong="H8415"\w* rivers break \w out|strong="H3318"\w*:

\w A|strong="H0776"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* vineyards, wherein \w fig|strong="H8384"\w* \w trees|strong="H2132"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* oliveyards grow: \w a|strong="H0776"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*.

\w Where|strong="H0834"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w want|strong="H2637"\w* thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thy \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* enjoy abundance \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*: \w where|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w out|strong="H2672"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w hills|strong="H2042"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* dug mines \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*:

\w That|strong="H0834"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* art \w full|strong="H7646"\w*, thou mayst \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* excellent \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee.

\w Take|strong="H8104"\w* \w heed|strong="H8104"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w beware|strong="H8104"\w* \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* any \w time|strong="H3117"\w* thou \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w neglect|strong="H4687"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* ceremonies, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*:

\w Lest|strong="H6435"\w* after thou hast \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* art \w filled|strong="H7646"\w*, hast \w built|strong="H1129"\w* goodly \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w them|strong="H0398"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* shalt \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w plenty|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*,

Thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w lifted|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou remember \w not|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* thee \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1419"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* thy leader \w in|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* terrible \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w wherein|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w* burning \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* breath, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* scorpion \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* dipsas, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w at|strong="H0369"\w* \w all|strong="H1419"\w*: \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* streams \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* hardest \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w fed|strong="H0398"\w* thee \w in|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w manna|strong="H4478"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*. \w And|strong="H0398"\w* after \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* afflicted \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w proved|strong="H5254"\w* thee, \w at|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w last|strong="H0319"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H3808"\w* thee,

Lest thou shouldst \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w in|strong="H2088"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*: \w My|strong="H3027"\w* own \w might|strong="H3581"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H3027"\w* own \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* achieved all \w these|strong="H2088"\w* things \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H3824"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w might|strong="H4616"\w* \w fulfill|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, \w concerning|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w present|strong="H5414"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* sheweth.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w follow|strong="H0310"\w* strange \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* adore \w them|strong="H0853"\w*: behold \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* foretell thee \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w utterly|strong="H0006"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*.

\w As|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H0006"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* thy entrance, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* disobedient \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
